location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a packet to be delivered to the President in Council at Bombay, containing the information about the Peace being signed between France and Austria on 14 October 1809 and a report of His Majesty's Ministers having resigned from their offices, and asking to make sure this was delivered quickly and safely.
